mapper.select: select PJT_NUM , EMP_NUMBER , WORK_DT , WORK_HOUR , WORK_TYPE_CD , WORK_TYPE_LRG , WORK_TYPE_MDM , WORK_TYPE_SML , RLTN_SYS , WORK_TRTR , APRV_TYPE , APRV_EMP_NUMBER , NOTE , REGI_DTM , APRV_DTM from DNKR_PJT where 'SqlMap-Pjt.searchByKey' = 'SqlMap-Pjt.searchByKey' and PJT_NUM = #{pjtNum}
